data: BRACE SPROUL HEAD OF APPLIED AI @ LANGCHAIN AI/ML Engineer heading LangChain's Applied AI team. Interested in agents, drones, and rockets. Over $1M in lifetime sales with hundreds enterprise scale businesses, and direct to consumer.
